basic.origin: Liaoning, Jilin, Heilongjiang, Mongolia, Hebei, Shanxi, Shandong, Shaanxi, Gansu
basic.production: Liaoning, Jiling, Heilongjiang, Inner Mongolia, Hebei, Shanxi, Shandong, Shaanxi, Gansu
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-June, fruiting period September-October
basic.color: Flower color white, fruit color red, yellow, brown

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.pruning: Remove the pests-infested, old, dead and shaded branches of the plants
